#define pb push_back
#define max(a,b) a>b?a:b
#define min(a,b) a<b?a:b
#define ll long long
#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int m,n;
	scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
	while(m!=0&&n!=0)
	{
		int i,val[510]={0},e[510]={0},j,dp[510][510];
		memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d%d",&val[i],&e[i]);
		}
	for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<=m;j++)
		{
			if(i==0||j==0)
			{
				dp[i][j]=0;
			}
			else if(val[i-1]<=j)
			{
				dp[i][j]=max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i-1][j-val[i-1]]+e[i-1]);
			}
			else
			{
				dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j];
			}
		}
	}
	int m1=m,n1=n,ans=0,an=0;
	for(i=0;i<=m;i++)
	{
		if(dp[n][i]>ans)
		{
			ans=dp[n][i];
			an=i;
		}
	}
	printf("%d %d\n",an,dp[n][m]);
	scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
